Class Doctor

java.lang.Object
User
Doctor
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPasswordUpdate
public class Doctor extends User
The `Doctor` class represents a doctor in the system. It includes information about the doctor's age, availability, and schedule. The class provides methods to manage appointments, availability, and scheduling.
